meanings.definition: A technique of painting in which small, distinct dots of color are applied in patterns to form an image.
meanings.sent1: The artist used pointillisms to create a beautiful landscape painting.
meanings.sent2: Pointillisms can be seen in many famous artworks by Georges Seurat.
meanings.sent3: The art student tried pointillisms for the first time and ended up with a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her use of pointillisms was like creating a mosaic of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the intricate beauty of pointillisms in various paintings.

meanings.definition: The style of painting using this technique.
meanings.sent1: The gallery featured a collection of paintings in the unique style of pointillisms.
meanings.sent2: Art enthusiasts appreciate the intricate details found in pointillisms.
meanings.sent3: The artist's dedication to pointillisms was evident in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was a modern interpretation of traditional pointillisms.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition highlighted the evolution of pointillisms in contemporary art.
